description: Look up ?Latin Lover? in the dictionary and the picture you find will be of Ricky. The sexuality just radiates off his handsome face and naturally muscular body. His killer smile and sexy accent just make him even more irresistible.Seeing him rub the packed front of his white jockey's as he started talking about the women in his life made me wish the camera didn't require two hands because damn, I wanted to do some rubbing of our own. Talking with straight guys about sex and then filming then jacking off may be part of my job but this time, I just wanted to sit back and watch the show!For the big finish, Ricky doesn't just rub off a cum shot, he unleashes an explosion of sperm that leaves his chest covered in a white lake deep enough to swim in.
title: Columbian Gold, Scene #02
